description:
Verify that the user lands on home page.
Go to shoes category
Click on the first item that shows up on the page.
Add that product to the cart.
Go to the cart and verify that the product is in the cart.
Add shipping details for Amanda Kim
Click "Checkout" button. 
Verify redirect to order success page
Verify order confirmation number is displayed.

steps.stepDescription: Open a web browser and navigate to the website at http://localhost:3005.
Verify that the home page loads and displays the banner image.
Select the shoes category from the navigation menu.
Click on the first item displayed in the shoes category listing.
Add the selected product to the shopping cart.
Go to the shopping cart page and confirm that the product is present.

Fill in the shipping details for Amanda Kim with Name: Amanda Kim, Email: amanda.kim@example.com, Street Address: 123 Main Street, City: San Francisco, State: CA, Country: United States, and Zipcode: 12345.
Click the Checkout button to proceed with the order.
Check that an order confirmation number is displayed on the success page.
Take a screenshot of the completed order to validate the successful checkout.

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Browse product, add to cart, complete checkout

description:
Open the url and verify that the user lands on home page.
Go to shoes category
Click on the first item that shows up on the page, and add that product to the cart.
Go to the cart and verify that there is one product in the cart.
Click on the "Checkout Button" and verify user stays on the same page.

Verify that: name, and email field shows error state.

steps.stepDescription: Open a web browser and navigate to http://localhost:3005 and confirm the home page displays a banner image.
Select the 'shoes' category from the navigation menu on the home page.
On the shoes category page, click on the first product that appears.
Add the selected product to the shopping cart using the available add product option.
Navigate to the shopping cart page and verify that exactly one product is present in the cart.
Click on the 'Checkout Button' on the cart page to proceed with checkout.
Confirm that the user remains on the same page after clicking the 'Checkout Button'.
Verify that both the Name and Email fields on the checkout form display an error state.
Capture a final screenshot of the page to ensure all steps have been completed.

generatedSteps.stepsSummary: Navigate, add product to cart, verify checkout errors
